doc.field: Includes: Hotel Lexington's Hawaiian Room menu (1937), gift of Dorothy Barck, 1937; Romeo Salta, mailed as correspondence with commentary (1954); Peter Luger's foil covering for chocolates (1987); plastic tab used to indicate degree beef was cooked, medium rare in this sample (1988); Serendity 3 (1988); Great American Health Bar (1991); Lexington Avenue Grill (1991); Piatti Pronti menu (1991); Keen's Chophouse (1990s?); City Bakery (1994 Lemonade Festival); Bond 45 (2005), gift of Joshua Hamerman, 2019.

Undated: Copacabana (highlighting Dean Martin & Jerry Lewis in the Copa's revue); Leon & Eddie's; Pluck U napkin; Gage & Tollner tea bag tag; O'Farrell's; Palm Beach Bar at Billy Rose's Casa Manana, numbered song list for requests; Martino's; Hermitage Shoppe tea room; Artepasta; B.R Guest Restaurants (various); Jerry's; Bruno's; Mars 2112; Mom's Bagels; Official All Star Cafe; Sundance menu; Yorkville Common Pantry free meal ticket; Beanstalk; Plataforma; Lucy's napkin; Zimmerman's Hungaria souvenir photograph of 7 women at table; Turf Cafe souvenir photograph frame (no photo); Stork Club napkin; Rainbow Gourmet menu; Jewelers Restaurant & Cafe I menu; Gold Rush; Le Cafe menu; Frank's; Harley Davidson New York Cafe; Hard Rock Cafe; El Tunnel menu.

Business cards: Mustang Sally's; Good Diner; Hasak; Hummus Place (2007); La Tour; Planet Hollywood; Bobby Van's Steakhouse; Ruby Foo's; Goldfinger's, gift of Craig Klose 2007; Dallas BBQ; Figs; McDonough's Spa; Kaspars; Official All Star Cafe; Jerry's; British Open; Plataforma; Martino's; Triple Crown ale house.
Series I: Ephemera >> Hotels and Restaurants - NYC Restaurants
